common.maintenance: ASTRAL is under maintenance. Please, retry in a few moments.
common.name: Name
common.unauthorized: You are not allowed to access this page :-(

errors.403-delete: You are not allowed to delete this item!
errors.423-delete: This item can't be deleted because it is used somewhere!

auth.define-password-description: Please, enter your email and define your password.
auth.forgot-password-description: Please, enter your email and you will receive a link to reset your password.
auth.login-message: Sign in with your login details...
auth.login-unknown-error: Connection error! You should check your internet connection and retry.
auth.reset-link-sent: Please, check your emails. We just sent a reset link!

users.delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
users.no-user: There is currently no user in this store.

roles.delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this role?
roles.no-role: Roles can be used in order to control users permissions. You haven't defined any role yet. Create roles and assign them to users...

clients.delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this client?
clients.no-client: You need to declare clients in order to let third-party applications send statements to the LRS. Let's go!

accesses.delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this access?
accesses.no-access: You need to declare one or several accesses to let this client send statements to the LRS. Let's go!

entities.delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this entity?
entities.no-entity: Entities are used to manage data visibility and filtering. You haven't defined any entity yet.

owners.delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this owner?
owners.no-owner: Owners are used to manage data visibility. You haven't defined any owner yet.

stores.delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this store?
stores.no-store: Stores are independent parts of the database where xAPI data is recorded. You must define one or several stores.

search.no-result: There is no result with these filters :-(

agents.destroy-user-agents: Destroy all the xAPI data associated with these agents
agents.destroy-user-agents-confirm: Are you sure you want to destroy all the xAPI data associated with these agents?
agents.no-agent: There is currently no agent associated with this user.
agents.remove-from-user-confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this agent from this user?

clear-all.title: Clear data
clear-all.description: All xAPI related data will be deleted, including pure xAPI data (Statements, Activities, Agents, States, Profiles, States), as well as vocabulary and logs.
clear-all.confirm: Do you really want to delete all the LRS data? This is a definitive action!
clear-all.error: Sorry, there was an issue during data deletion :-(
clear-all.conflict: Sorry, there are too many data. This operation should be done from the console.

delete-statements.title: Delete Statements
delete-statements.description: All the statements of the selected entity/client/access will be deleted.
delete-statements.confirm: Do you really want to delete the statements? This is a definitive action!
delete-statements.error: Sorry, there was an issue during statements deletion :-(
delete-statements.conflict: Sorry, there are too many data. This operation should be done from the console.

delete-logs.title: Delete Logs
delete-logs.description: All the logs of the selected entity/client/access will be deleted.
delete-logs.confirm: Do you really want to delete the logs? This is a definitive action!
delete-logs.error: Sorry, there was an issue during logs deletion :-(

privacy.my-endpoint-username: A username for the Basic HTTP authentication
privacy.my-endpoint-password: A password for the Basic HTTP authentication
privacy.my-endpoint-empty: Fill-in the following form and click on [Create] to create your personal endpoint.
privacy.my-endpoint-existing: Below are the endpoint URL and your Basic HTTP credentials. You can change the username and password.
privacy.my-endpoint-token-error: There is no agent associated with your account so you can't create an endpoint for the moment.
